399:3: yāvat sattvān paśyanti sma parasparaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇān |
399:7: viṃśativarṣāṇi paripūrṇāni kāntārasya ca pratipannasya ca |
399:11: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaścintāmāpede–kenopāyenāhaṃ sattvān sarvān sukhopadhānaistasmātkāntārānmahādārūṇādakālamaraṇātparimocayeyaṃ saṃtarpayeyam?
399:15: tadā paścāddivyāni piṣṭakāni rasarasāgropetāni tenāhāreṇa paripūrṇāni |
399:16: yadāhāreṇa saṃtarpitā bhavanti tadā dhānyavarṣāṇi patanti,
399:18: vividhāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca pravarṣanti sma |
399:19: yadā yadā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ke'pyabhiprāyā bhavanti,
399:21: atha te māgadhakāḥ sattvāstadidaṃ vicitraṃ svātmasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ ca vyupaśāntam,
399:25: tatasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ kubjo gopāṇasīvakro'dhibhagno dāṇḍaparāyaṇaḥ anekavarṣaśatasahasrāyuṣikaḥ |
399:26: sa teṣāṃ madhye sthitvā kathayati–na yuṣmākamanyadevasya kasyacidīdṛśaṃ prabhāvo bhavati virahitādavalokiteśvarasya |
399:28: atha sa puruṣa āryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ bhāṣitumārabdhaḥ–
399:38: sukhitāste sattvā loke ye tasya nāmamanusmaranti |
399:40: sacetanāste puruṣapuṃgavā ye avalokiteśvarasya satataparigrahaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ niryātayanti |
399:44: aśvaratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam |
399:49: yatra yatropapadyante tatra tatra parīpūrṇakāyāśca bhavanti |
399:53: atha sa jīrṇapurūṣaḥ ānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā svakaṃ gṛhaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgataḥ |
399:55: atha sa ākāśe cintāmāpede–viśvabhūstathāgato me cirakālaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ,
399:59: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat–katamo'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattva āgacchati?
399:60: bhagavānāha– eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati |
399:62: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vāmapārśve viśrāntaḥ ||
399:63: atha sa punaḥ śrāntaṃ viditvā bhagavān pṛcchati–śrāntastvaṃ kulaputra |
399:65: tana tasya bhūtapūrvaṃ varṇitam–sadā preteṣvavīcyupapanneṣu kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu hāhe tapane mahānarake,
399:69: eṣu mahānarakeṣu ye sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiḥ sattvānāmaparipākakṛtā kartavyā,
399:72: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramavismayamāpannaḥ– na ca me bodhisattvabhūtasya īdṛśaṃ viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śruta vā,
399:74: athe gaganagañjo bodhisattvo'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ sthitvā avalokiteśvaramevamāha–mā tvaṃ śrāntaḥ |
399:76: sa āha–na cāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ madhye śrānto na kliṣṭaḥ |
399:77: tau parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitau ||
399:78: atha bhagavān ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitumārabdhaḥ–śṛṇvantu kulaputrāḥ |
399:82: imāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ |
399:84: te ca bodhisattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu prakrāntāḥ ||
